author: Irene
title: Good Robot
review:
This is a great little set. I'm so glad that Lego started to polybag-pack the monthly builds. 
The build is fast, and the head & arms motion is very robotic.  There are spares of the tiny pieces, extra dots & red 1x1 plate.
He sits proudly at my desk at work.

Box/Instructions

Polybag with paper instructions

 

Parts

Lots of dots. I liked the translucent -blue dots best.

I loved the single panel PRINTED robot gauge - plate

Minifigures

none

The build

In minutes - but I did need to follow the instructions, and carefully place the dots & 1x1 (lantern) bricks in the head.

The completed model

I will display this on my desk.

Overall opinion

I loved this.  A nice build with some complexity, but most kids could do this.
